prompt: A documentary-style photograph of two engineers in their late 20s, collaborating intensely at a startup office table with exposed brick walls and mixed seating. They are dressed casually in hoodies and t-shirts, surrounded by laptops displaying code, notebooks with sketches, and coffee mugs. Cool, natural window light with a soft indigo cast fills the workspace, highlighting their focused expressions and the authentic, lived-in environment. Electric violet accents appear subtly in a water bottle and a piece of clothing. The composition uses the rule of thirds, placing the subjects slightly off-center, with 35% negative space in a muted graphite background. The overall mood is calm, purposeful, and intellectually intense, evoking quiet confidence and the satisfaction of problem-solving.

A documentary-style photograph of two ML engineers in their late 20s collaborating in a modern startup workspace with exposed brick, cool natural window light, and subtle pops of electric violet in clothing or desk objects. The scene conveys calm focus and purposeful problem-solving, with one person leaning in to discuss code on a laptop while the other gestures thoughtfully. The composition uses the rule of thirds, with intentional negative space and muted graphite and zinc tones in the environment. The workspace shows lived-in authenticity with coffee cups, notebooks with mathematical diagrams, and technical books. No screens display dashboards or interfaces, and there are no abstract patterns, tech overlays, or text anywhere in the image.

Professional headshot of an Asian woman ML engineer in a modern, lived-in startup office. She is in her late 20s, dressed casually in a hoodie and jeans, sitting at her desk with a laptop open showing code. The environment is authentic and functional, with mixed furniture, technical books, coffee cup, and subtle Electric Violet accents in the workspace. Cool, natural window light casts a soft, slightly indigo-tinged tone; moderate saturation and high clarity. The subject is focused, with a calm, determined expression, slightly off-center in the frame. Negative space with cool gray background elements, subtle layers of workspace visible behind her. Candid, documentary style—no posing, no tech dashboards, no text, no abstract elements.

Professional headshot of a Black man ML engineer in a modern, open tech workspace. He is in his early 30s, wearing a casual t-shirt and jeans, seated at a workstation with a laptop displaying code and a notebook with mathematical diagrams. The scene includes authentic details like a water bottle, technical books, and practical office lighting. Cool, soft natural light creates a calm, indigo-infused mood; moderate saturation, high clarity, and accurate skin tone. The subject is slightly off-center, with an expression of calm concentration. Workspace context includes mixed seating and subtle Electric Violet accents, with negative space and a graphite-toned background. Documentary, unforced style—no tech dashboards, no text, no abstract elements.

Professional headshot of a Hispanic woman ML engineer at her workstation in a co-working space. She appears in her late 20s, casually dressed in a t-shirt and hoodie, focused on her laptop which displays code. The environment feels authentic: coffee cup, technical books, whiteboard with mathematical diagrams, and subtle Electric Violet details in the decor. Cool, soft natural light with a slight indigo cast, moderate saturation, and high clarity. The subject is positioned slightly to the side, with a look of determined focus. The background shows lived-in workspace elements with intentional negative space and muted tones. Candid, documentary photographic approach—no tech dashboards, no text, no abstract elements.
